text: Joan Hotchkis (September 21, 1927 â€“ September 27, 2022) was an American stage, screen and television actor, writer and performance artist. She was a lifetime member of the Actors Studio and the Dramatists Guild. Hotchkis played Dr. Nancy Cunningham for several seasons on The Odd Couple. She co-wrote with Eric Morris the acting manual "No Acting Please" (1977),Complete results for "No Acting Please" in year 1977. WorldCat. Retrieved December 13, 2012. which is still used in colleges and conservatories.Elston, Ken (Approved September 19, 2012). George Mason University Course Approval Form. She also created performance art works in the 1990s. She died on September 27, 2022, six days after her 95th birthday. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
